import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./styles.css"; export const UserList = (props) => { const [userList, setUserList] = useState([]) props.getUsers() .then((state) => state.filter(people => people.active)) .then(people => setUserList(people)); return
{userList?.length ? userList.map((el) => <>) : 'Пользователей нет ....'}

; }; export default UserList;
